actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973 to extend the effective period of such act.

summary.text: Makes permanent the Emergency Daylight Savings Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973 to extend the effective period of such act.
